errors.error_description: Claims support for Python 2.7 which is deprecated and likely not supported by current Monty versions
correction_candidates: Change to: Monty supports Python 3.8+ for modern compatibility
Update to: Monty supports Python 3.6 and above
Modify to: Monty requires Python 3.7 or newer versions
Correct to: Monty supports Python 3.x (3.9+ recommended)
errors.golden_answer: Change to: Monty supports Python 3.8+ for modern compatibility
